choice.heading: Why choose Easybank ?
choice.description: We leverage Open Banking to turn your bank account into your financial hub. Control your finances like never before.

list.title: Online Banking
list.description: Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

list.title: Simple Budgeting
list.description: See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you’re close to hitting your limits.

list.title: Fast Onboarding
list.description: We don’t do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away.

list.title: Open API
list.description: Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier.

list.author: Claire Robinson
list.title: Receive money in any currency with no fees
list.description: The world is getting smaller and we’re becoming more mobile. So why should you be forced to only receive money in a single …

list.author: Wilson Hutton
list.title: Treat yourself without worrying about money
list.description: Our simple budgeting feature allows you to separate out your spending and set realistic limits each month. That means you …

list.author: Wilson Hutton
list.title: Take your Easybank card wherever you go
list.description: We want you to enjoy your travels. This is why we don’t charge any fees on purchases while you’re abroad. We’ll even show you …

list.author: Claire Robinson
list.title: Our invite-only Beta accounts are now live!
list.description: After a lot of hard work by the whole team, we’re excited to launch our closed beta. It’s easy to request an invite through the site ...
